DOC.brief_summary: We hypothesize relative family receive standard individual postpartum pediatric care , family receive group care likely : - Improved maternal child health behavior : i.e increase breastfeeding , exercise , child safety measure home decrease smoking . - Better health care use baby : i.e . attend care visit , on-time complete immunization decrease emergency service use . - Better psychosocial outcomes family : i.e . decreased stress depression , increase social support . - Improved parenting skill : i.e . improve knowledge child development , involvement developmentally appropriate activity , parental sense competence .
DOC.brief_title: Integrating Well-Woman Well-Baby Care Improve Parenting Family Wellness
DOC.criteria: Postpartum woman baby care Receive wellwoman care , wellchild care interview English Willingness receive care group set Woman plan receive care Yale Women 's Center Primary Care Center baby severe medical problem require individualize care mother baby Baby bear less 37 week gestation Baby remain hospital mother get discharge reason except hyperbilirubinemia Baby severe cardiac , respiratory , neurodevelopmental surgical problem
DOC.keyword: primary care , high-risk family , maternal depression
